alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 06 at 6:49PM MST until August 06 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN COCHISE AND EAST CENTRAL SANTA CRUZ COUNTIES... At 649 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain has fallen. An automated rain gauge at Parker Canyon Lake reported 1.58 inches of rainfall. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Parker Canyon Lake, Canelo and Coronado National Memorial. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
